subtitleNullable: Collection of 2K images contains hand fingers displaying one to four.
descriptionNullable:
### Context

The story behind this is to properly do a data science project from the head to toe. So i created this dataset and actually make sure that each image is different. This dataset is purposefully created in such a way that little bit of preprocessing is used.Generated using google's teachable machine. Where we can create the image dataset and also train and test a model with the personally created dataset. The coolest thing is completely online and.. and... you can download the dataset, the model so that you can run it on your machine.


### Content

The dataset you look is not actually raw data and at the same time not a properly structured one. It has 4 classification of images without labels and images in the classification dont follow a unique id. 


### Acknowledgements

A huge thanks to the google's [teachable machine](https://teachablemachine.withgoogle.com/) . Newbie can utilize this tool to create their own datasets in minutes.


### Inspiration

Inspired from the current and aspiring data scientists to do something for the community. This dataset is just a seed.
